title: Kandinsky
brief_description: Working his way from totally familiar to abstract forms, Wassily Kandinsky changed the course of modern art in an exuberant mastery of colour. His Russian origin is stressed and his later turn towards the fine arts with a philosophic metaphysical outlook are emphasised.
